name: Amayzon.com
description:
Work in the packaging warehouse of the future!

You've just joined Amayzon.com, with your recently converted meat processing facility you're ready to meet customer needs before they realize they even need them.

Objects will enter your fulfillment area, where you must place them into boxes so they can be shipped to customers. 

Each package has requirements that must be met. Customer looking for food? Great, send them a cow. Looking for something alive? Cow again! They actually want a cow? Perfect, send them a squid to show them whos boss.

Be careful though, losing items in the furnace, or sending customers the wrong item will cost you. Run out of money and your warehouse days are over.
